archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0718
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer with multiple accounts and services, I want to be able to make simple changes to my account quickly when the need arises so that I can easily manage multiple tasks and have time to do the things I enjoy

properties.value: OOTB addressed by build in processes concept where there are dedicated, simple processes for various actions (change billl adress, bill cycle, credit score, consents, etc)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
